name: The Immortal Throne
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam Week 102

You proudly sit in the mysterious yet powerful throne, granting you powers and gifts out of the ordinary. This throne has become envied by many of your challengers, and would gladly take it from you.

Obviously, not without a fight.

Fight off waves of enemies, upgrade your character after every wave, and remember to not go far from the Throne.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move character
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Place Turret

Music from Stark Fist
